headline: Buy Stocks on the Dip? Here’s a Better Strategy.
summary: Many investors welcomed the market’s recent decline as an opportunity to buy the dip. That’s not the best strategy, argue two analysts.

raw.headline: Buy Stocks on the Dip? Here’s a Better Strategy.

headline: Lithium Deficit Could Boost Albemarle (ALB) Stock, Says UBS
summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) is included among the 15 Best Stocks to Buy for the Long Term. UBS upgraded Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) to Buy from Neutral on December 5, and also raised its price target to $185 from $107. The update came as the firm expects growing energy storage demand, coupled with years of slower capacity […]
